# Replacement of Chillers and Cooling Tower

## Amendment to Tender Submission Details

* Amendment Number: 4
* Solicitation Number: WS3768577369
* Publication Date: February 28, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: April 13, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT

Please be advised that the previously advertised response deadline closing time for submission of bids through Ariba Discovery has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by April 13th, 2023 at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

## Project Description

The scope of this project involves the replacement of the existing chillers and cooling tower serving the Shirley's Bay cooling plant in building #3 at the Shirley's Bay Complex. The new cooling system must include:

* Two new chillers
* One new cooling tower
* Two new condenser pumps with Variable Frequency Drives (VFDs) to meet current codes, standards, and regulations

The work must be completed within 49 weeks after the contract is awarded.
